Package epidemicProtocol.servers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MessageSpreadThread
    Thread that make a TCP socket connection with a host and send it some message depending on the message received as parameter.
    SpreadServer
    Thread that accept other computers requests and open a MessageSpreadThread to handle it.
    TargetsListServer
    This server is bind in the port defined in MainWindow.TARGETS_LIST_PORT.
